name: Website Hero Sections Figma Template | BRIX Templates
description:
Looking to update the hero section of your website homepage? Clone one of our 6 free hero sections.


Clone this Figma template, copy your favorite hero section, and that is all!


What's included in this Website Hero Sections Figma Template from BRIX Templates?


  • Figma Cloneable
  • Webflow Cloneable


Want to get the Webflow cloneable to use these hero sections on your Webflow website? Clone it today from the Webflow Showcase.
